entries.s_f0a76084: You don't have to lie to make me feel better.
entries.s_e83d11f6: No, I don't have it in me.
entries.s_e00a6a73: I see she has already found a replacement for me.
entries.s_cb5a9d1b: Right.. can you just please get back to the delivery?
entries.s_c5493e9b: I have hopes and dreams too!  I have talent!
entries.s_b4b8a975: There are plenty of worse professions out there.
entries.s_a54bac2d: I don't care what she thinks... I'm following my own dreams.
entries.s_7fb2178f: I'm just here to get you to return with her supplies.
entries.s_70d2d7a8: Because... I... I've lost all direction in my life, where do I go from here? There must be something better than fetching dirt and droppings from various places.  But I have nowhere else to go.
entries.s_5c12a1a9: I've told her already, I'm not fetching her 'mud and refuse' ever again.
entries.s_5439ef9: Then why are you digging around in the mud?
entries.s_26360156:
Yeah. Okay. Thanks, tell Sathme that I'm sorry.

[You take the painting supplies, but decide putting them in your inventory could result in a big mess. So instead you store them someplace safer.]
entries.s_1ed6eefa: Then let me return with the paint mixture for you.
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (padawan_artist_02.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
